publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1804 Margaret Smith: Ratho Adventure Centre—That the Parliament notes with concern the continuing financial uncertainty facing Ratho Adventure Centre and urges the Scottish Executive, given the importance of securing the future of the centre and its sporting, cultural and conference facilities, including the world-class National Rock Climbing Centre, the National Academy of the Scottish Judo Federation, facilities for triathlon and scuba-diving, a health club and an auditorium and accommodation for ninety people, to explore all avenues with the City of Edinburgh Council, Scottish Enterprise Edinburgh and Lothian, sportscotland, the Mountaineering Council of Scotland and other interested parties in order to retain this unique asset for the people of Scotland. Supported by: Michael Matheson*

S2M-1804 Ratho Adventure Centre (lodged on 29 September 2004) Mike Pringle*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bruce Crawford*, David McLetchie*, Murray Tosh*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Sarah Boyack*, Nora Radcliffe*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-1804 Margaret Smith: Ratho Adventure Centre—That the Parliament notes with concern the continuing financial uncertainty facing Ratho Adventure Centre and urges the Scottish Executive, given the importance of securing the future of the centre and its sporting, cultural and conference facilities, including the world-class National Rock Climbing Centre, the National Academy of the Scottish Judo Federation, facilities for triathlon and scuba-diving, a health club and an auditorium and accommodation for ninety people, to explore all avenues with the City of Edinburgh Council, Scottish Enterprise Edinburgh and Lothian, sportscotland, the Mountaineering Council of Scotland and other interested parties in order to retain this unique asset for the people of Scotland. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Mike Pringle, Mr Jamie Stone, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Bruce Crawford, David McLetchie, Murray Tosh, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Sarah Boyack, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Sandra White, Colin Fox*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-1804 Ratho Adventure Centre (lodged on 29 September 2004) Margo MacDonald*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1804 Ratho Adventure Centre (lodged on 29 September 2004) Dennis Canavan*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-1804 Ratho Adventure Centre (lodged on 29 September 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1804 Ratho Adventure Centre (lodged on 29 September 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
